channel.title: Win32 Errror is pissing me off
channel.description:
Ok this is either a virus (cause i had it before)
Or a virus caused it. it is pissing me off.
Everytime i boot up my pc like 5 minutes after i boot it a win32 error comes up and when i click dont send it changes my desktop and the sound goes away
Really pisses me off because NO virus scanner can detect it even nod32
Anyone got any ideas on how this thing can be destroyed?
EDIT: Added Picture.

item.title: Win32 Errror is pissing me off
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

yea i tried a patch. ill see if it works.

aww for fuck sake man as soon as i clicked post it came on again

Read full topic
item.source: Win32 Errror is pissing me off

item.title: Win32 Errror is pissing me off
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

You have windows xp SP2 correct? if so then the following patch should fix this:

http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyId=A87B44B9-7A6A-49B6-BD89-AFAD4E049C48&amp;displaylang=en

item.title: Win32 Errror is pissing me off
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

On another topic

Format

you obvoiusly dont know shit, you dont need to format ure pc to get rid of this error, like i said i have had it before and used mcafee to get rid of it , tried mcafee on this time and no joy.
